name: Shrimp and Crab Nachos
author: Kathi Richards Smith
summary: A taco with a twist. You will love these nachos with shrimp and crab. The seafood isn't too overpowering, and it is just the right touch to a Mexican night at home. Top with lettuce, tomatoes, or any other toppings you like.
ingredients: ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened
¼ cup sour cream, for topping
¼ cup salsa, or as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring 1 quart of water to a boil in a large pot
Place shrimp and crab in a steamer basket on top of the pot without touching water; cover
Steam until shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 5 minutes
Remove shrimp and crab meat from steamer and chop
Combine seafood mixture and cream cheese in a bowl
Lay taco shells on a baking sheet and top with seafood-cream cheese mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is completely melted, about 15 minutes
Cut each taco into 4 pieces using a pizza cutter and top with sour cream and salsa
